title: Kaloko-Honok≈çhau National Historical Park: History & Culture
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture             History & Culture      Look out across the stark and barren landscape stretching out before you.  Although seemingly inhospitable, Hawaiian settlements thrived here for many years.  Surrounding you are the clues that tell the story of how the people that once lived here raised crops, harvested from the sea and practiced their religion.
